tool_description: Analyzes audience survey data and demographic information to generate detailed audience insights and persona profiles for content strategy development.

survey_responses.description: Array of survey response IDs or data points to analyze

demographic_fields.description: Demographic categories to analyze (age, gender, income, location, interests)

segment_threshold.description: Minimum percentage for creating audience segments (5-50)

error_messages: Insufficient survey data: Provide at least 10 survey responses for meaningful analysis.
Invalid demographic fields: Use recognized demographic categories like age, gender, income, location, interests.
Segment threshold out of range: Must be between 5 and 50 percent.
usage: Provide survey_responses array and demographic_fields to analyze. Set segment_threshold to control granularity of audience segments. Returns detailed audience insights and persona profiles.

primary_segments.description: List of identified primary audience segments

demographic_breakdown.description: Detailed demographic analysis for each field

persona_profiles.description: Generated persona descriptions with key characteristics

content_preferences.description: Preferred content types and formats by segment
